Instruction: Wash the star fruit thoroughly, then slice them into thin, star-shaped pieces.
In a large bowl, combine the sliced star fruit, sliced strawberries, and sliced kiwi.
In a small bowl, whisk together honey and lime juice to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the fruit salad and toss gently to coat.
Garnish the salad with fresh mint leaves before serving.
